<title level="1" right="Action">[Frightening Display](/Actions.aspx?ID=555) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your ape makes a loud and frightening display, throwing a foe off balance. The ape attempts to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the target creature; this display gains the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) trait and doesn't require language. While frightened by this ability, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to your ape.
name: Frightening Display
